title: Hero MotoCorp to hike prices by up to 2 pc from April
description: Hero MotoCorp on Wednesday said it will increase prices of its model range by around 2 per cent from next month in order to offset the impact of rise in production cost in order to conform to stricter emission norms. The price revision will be around 2 per cent and the exact quantum of increase will vary by specific models and markets, it added.
